tachyon.worker

Class WorkerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.WorkerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class WorkerClient
extends Object
implements Closeable
    The client talks to a worker server. It keeps sending keep alive message to the worker server. Since WorkerService.Client is not thread safe, this class has to guarantee thread safety.

      Creates a WorkerClient.

      • createNewSession

        public void createNewSession(long newSessionId)
        Updates the session id of the client, starting a new session. The previous session's held resources should have already been freed, and will be automatically freed after the timeout is exceeded.
        Parameters:
        newSessionId - the new id that represents the new session

        public String lockBlock(long blockId)

      • sessionHeartbeat

        public void sessionHeartbeat()
                      throws IOException
        Sends a session heartbeat to the worker. This renews the client's lease on resources such as locks and temporary files and updates the worker's metrics.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs during the heartbeat

      • periodicHeartbeat

        public void periodicHeartbeat()
        Called only by WorkerClientHeartbeatExecutor, encapsulates sessionHeartbeat() in order to cancel and cleanup the heartbeating thread in case of failures
